Package common.hardware.input

Class NAR_Joystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.hardware.input.NAR_Joystick
  • public class NAR_Joystick
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the WPILib Joystick class. Works with Logitech Extreme 3D Pro and Thrustmaster T16000M.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NAR_Joystick​(int port)
      Creates a new NAR_Joystick object

    • Constructor Detail

      • NAR_Joystick

        public NAR_Joystick​(int port)
        Creates a new NAR_Joystick object
        Parameters:
        port - The port the joystick is connected on driver station

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Returns the Joystick's x axis value
        Returns:
        Joystick X on [-1, 1], -1 is left, 1 is right - default deadband is 0.05

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Returns the Joystick's y axis value
        Returns:
        Joystick Y on [-1, 1], -1 is backward, 1 is forward - default deadband is 0.05

      • getZ

        public double getZ()
        Returns the Joystick's z axis value
        Returns:
        Joystick Z on [-1, 1], -1 is twist left, 1 is twist right - default deadband is 0.05

      • getThrottle

        public double getThrottle()
        Returns the Joystick's throttle slider value
        Returns:
        Throttle on [0, 1] where 0 is throttle at bottom, 1 is throttle at top - Default lower bound is 0.3, upper bound is 0.8, so anything below 0.3 returns 0.3, anything above 0.8 returns 1.

      • setThrottleBounds

        public void setThrottleBounds​(double lowerBound,
                              double upperBound)
        Sets the throttle bounds for the joystick.
        Parameters:
        lowerBound - [0, 1] lowest possible throttle value.
        upperBound - [0, 1] highest possible throttle value.

      • getButton

        public edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.button.Trigger getButton​(int i)
        Returns the button of the Joystick
        Parameters:
        i - The ID of the button
        Returns:
        Trigger to store the command to run

      • getPOVButton

        public edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.button.Trigger getPOVButton​(int i)
        Returns the POV button of the joystick
        Parameters:
        i - The angle of the POV button in increments of 45 degrees
        Returns:
        Trigger to store the command to run
